Improvements:
 
 * Showing this release notes after app was updated
\ 
 * Sending error reports after unexpected app crashes, which help TH Wildau tracing the causes of such crashes
 
 Fixes:
 
 * Plus-Button for adding new meals was cut off at large system fonts
 
 * Question Log: day status was cut off in the table making it unreadable at large system fonts
 
 * Possible app crash when too many locally stored sensor data:
 Stored sensor had not been completely deleted from smartphone after they have been transmitted to the server
 
 * Daily questions and participant profile:
 All current input was lost after rotating the device screen
